languages.text: Оставшись на Веабосе, Соломон долго пытался взять себя в руки, истово борясь с бушующим гневом. Впрочем, продлилось это недолго. Маршал Стракс прибыл конфисковать ценное имущество Арбитес — кибермастифа — и подвергся нападению Соломона. Следуя приказу маршала, Глейто разорвал своего хозяина на части.

Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.
languages.original_text: Оставшись на Веабосе, Соломон долго пытался взять себя в руки, истово борясь с бушующим гневом. Впрочем, продлилось это недолго. Маршал Стракс прибыл конфисковать ценное имущество Арбитес — кибермастифа — и подвергся нападению Соломона. Следуя приказу маршала, Глейто разорвал своего хозяина на части.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne stayed on Vheabos and struggled long and hard to wrestle back control of himself from his tumultuous anger. However, that was not to last. Marshal Strachs arrived in order to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — and was attacked by Solomorne. Following the Marshal's command, Glaito tore its master to pieces.

Solomorne stayed on Vheabos and struggled long and hard to wrestle back control of himself from his tumultuous anger. However, that was not to last. Marshal Strachs arrived in order to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — and was attacked by Solomorne. Following the Marshal's command, Glaito tore its master to pieces.

Solomorne remained on Vheabos, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore its master to pieces.

Solomorne remained on Vheabos, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore its master to pieces.

Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

languages.text: Solomorne blieb auf Vheabos-VI und trug einen langen und schweren Kampf aus, um die Kontrolle über seinen brodelnden Zorn zurückzuerlangen. Doch es sollte nicht sein. Eines Tages traf Marschall Strachs ein, um einen wertvollen Arbites-Aktivposten zu beschlagnahmen – den Cyber-Mastiff –, woraufhin Solomorne ihn angriff. Auf Befehl des Marschalls riss Glaito seinen Herren in Stücke.
languages.original_text: Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne blieb auf Vheabos-VI und trug einen langen und schweren Kampf aus, um die Kontrolle über seinen brodelnden Zorn zurückzuerlangen. Doch es sollte nicht sein. Eines Tages traf Marschall Strachs ein, um einen wertvollen Arbites-Aktivposten zu beschlagnahmen – den Cyber-Mastiff –, woraufhin Solomorne ihn angriff. Auf Befehl des Marschalls riss Glaito seinen Herren in Stücke.

languages.text: Solomorne demeura sur Vhéabos-VI, luttant tant bien que mal pour reprendre le contrôle de lui-même et ne plus se laisser dominer par la rage tumultueuse qui l'animait. Mais sa retraite fut de courte durée. Un beau jour, le maréchal Strachs s'en vint reprendre possession d'un bien précieux de l'Arbites : le cyber-mastiff. Mais Solomorne s'y refusa et se jeta sur le maréchal, qui donna alors l'ordre à Glaito de mettre son maître en pièces.
languages.original_text: Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne demeura sur Vhéabos-VI, luttant tant bien que mal pour reprendre le contrôle de lui-même et ne plus se laisser dominer par la rage tumultueuse qui l'animait. Mais sa retraite fut de courte durée. Un beau jour, le maréchal Strachs s'en vint reprendre possession d'un bien précieux de l'Arbites : le cyber-mastiff. Mais Solomorne s'y refusa et se jeta sur le maréchal, qui donna alors l'ordre à Glaito de mettre son maître en pièces.

languages.text: 索罗蒙留在了维博斯六号星，日复一日地挣扎着，试图控制自己汹涌的怒火。不过，他的挣扎并没有持续多久。某天，斯塔克斯元帅前来回收法务部的财产，也就是格雷托，但却遭到了索罗蒙的攻击。在元帅的命令之下，格雷托将它的主人撕成了碎片。
languages.original_text: Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙留在了维博斯六号星，日复一日地挣扎着，试图控制自己汹涌的怒火。不过，他的挣扎并没有持续多久。某天，斯塔克斯元帅前来回收法务部的财产，也就是格雷托，但却遭到了索罗蒙的攻击。在元帅的命令之下，格雷托将它的主人撕成了碎片。
索罗蒙留在了维博斯六号星，日复一日地挣扎着，试图控制自己汹涌的怒火。不过，他的挣扎并没有持续多久。某天，斯塔克斯元帅前来回收法务部的财产，也就是格雷托，但却遭到了索罗蒙的攻击。在元帅的命令之下，格雷托将它的主人撕成了碎片。

languages.text: Solomorne permaneció en Vheabos VI, luchando por recuperar el control sobre su furia incansable. Sin embargo, su buen juicio no estaba destinado a durar. Un día, el Mariscal Strachs le visitó para recuperar un activo valioso del Arbites, su cibermastín, lo que incitó a Solomorne a atacarle. Con la orden del Mariscal, Glaito despedazó a su amo.
languages.original_text: Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne permaneció en Vheabos VI, luchando por recuperar el control sobre su furia incansable. Sin embargo, su buen juicio no estaba destinado a durar. Un día, el Mariscal Strachs le visitó para recuperar un activo valioso del Arbites, su cibermastín, lo que incitó a Solomorne a atacarle. Con la orden del Mariscal, Glaito despedazó a su amo.

languages.text: ソロモーンはヴィアボス・VIに留まり、自らの激しい怒りから自分自身の理性を取り戻そうと長い間苦闘していた。しかし、それは永久には続かなかった。ある日、ストラッチス将帥が高等裁定局の貴重な資産であるサイバーマスチフを押収するためにやって来たが、ソロモーンに襲撃された。将帥の命令で、グライトは主人を八つ裂きにした。
languages.original_text: Solomorne remained on Vheabos VI, struggling long and hard to wrestle back control over himself from his own tumultuous rage. It was not to last, however. One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンはヴィアボス・VIに留まり、自らの激しい怒りから自分自身の理性を取り戻そうと長い間苦闘していた。しかし、それは永久には続かなかった。ある日、ストラッチス将帥が高等裁定局の貴重な資産であるサイバーマスチフを押収するためにやって来たが、ソロモーンに襲撃された。将帥の命令で、グライトは主人を八つ裂きにした。

languages.text: Solomorne, Vheabos VI'da kaldı. İçinde kopan öfke fırtınalarından sıyrılıp dizginleri tekrar eline almak için uzun ve zorlu bir mücadele verdi. Ancak gayreti uzun sürmedi. Bir gün Miralay Strachs, değerli bir Arbites varlığı olan siber mastife el koymaya geldiğinde Solomorne'un saldırısına uğradı. Miralay'ın emriyle Glaito, efendisini parçaladı.

One day, Marshal Strachs came to impound a valuable Arbites asset — the cyber-mastiff — only to be attacked by Solomorne. At the Marshal's command, Glaito tore his master to pieces.
